entry.title: EXTREME COLD WARNING , Granby
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 05:30 AM EST Thursday 02 February 2023

entry.title: Thursday: Chance of flurries. High minus 4. POP 40%
entry.summary: Cloudy with 40 percent chance of flurries. Wind becoming southwest 20 km/h gusting to 40 near noon. High minus 4. Wind chill near minus 12. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 05:00 AM EST Thursday 02 February 2023

entry.title: Thursday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 19. POP 40%
entry.summary: Cloudy. 40 percent chance of flurries changing to flurries at times heavy near midnight and ending overnight. Clearing before morning. Blowing snow overnight. Amount 2 to 4 cm. Wind southwest 30 km/h gusting to 50 becoming northwest 40 gusting to 60 near midnight. Low minus 19. Wind chill minus 12 this evening and minus 36 overnight. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 05:00 AM EST Thursday 02 February 2023

entry.title: Friday: Mainly sunny. Temperature falling to minus 28 in the afternoon.
entry.summary: Mainly sunny. Local blowing snow. Wind northwest 40 km/h gusting to 60. Temperature falling to minus 28 in the afternoon. Wind chill minus 36 in the morning and minus 46 in the afternoon. Frostbite in minutes. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 05:00 AM EST Thursday 02 February 2023
